title: Clear Noon, Moderate-Speed City Driving
caption: The ego vehicle drives down a city street with moderate speed, passing by a tall building and a parked truck.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.2 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is a two-lane city street with parked cars on the side. There are several other cars driving in the opposite direction. The weather is clear and sunny, with good visibility. There are no traffic lights or stop signs in the immediate vicinity of the ego vehicle.
reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a moderate speed to ensure safe driving in the city. It keeps a safe distance from the parked truck and other vehicles on the road. As the ego vehicle approaches an intersection, it prepares to slow down and stop if necessary.
